trans-unit.source: EEA App Visualization is the Core API for EEA Daviz. This package was added in order to be able to use EEA Google Charts without EEA Exhibit and viceversa or any other visualization library as a standalone visualization or as part of a bundle package (eea.daviz)
trans-unit.target: EEA应用程序可视化是EEA Daviz的核心API 。添加此软件包是为了能够在不使用EEA Exhibit的情况下使用EEA Google图表，反之亦然，或者将任何其他可视化库用作独立的可视化文件或作为捆绑包的一部分（eea.daviz）

trans-unit.source: EEA - European Environment Agency (EU)
trans-unit.target: EEA-欧洲环境署（EU）

trans-unit.source: Add eea.app.visualization to the list of eggs to install
trans-unit.target: 将eea.app.visualization添加到要安装的鸡蛋列表中

trans-unit.source: Bug Fix: Fixed i18n missing tags and i18n:domain in .pt files [prospchr refs #5162]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。修正了.pt文件中i18n缺少标签和i18n:domain的问题[prospchr refs #5162]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Add missing dependency to zope.formlib [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。在zope.formlib[avoinea]中添加缺失的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Added CSV UnicodeWriter as by default python csv module doesn’t know how to write unicode (see http://docs.python.org/2/library/csv.html) [voineali refs #14360]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：默认情况下，添加了CSV UnicodeWriter，因为python csv模块不知道如何编写unicode（请参阅http://docs.python.org/2/library/csv.html）[voineali refs＃14360]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Added delimiter restrictions to CSV dialect detection. Valid CSV delimiters are: {tab}, {space}, ;, ,, : [olimpiurob refs #19535]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。增加了CSV方言检测的定界符限制。有效的CSV定界符是 {tab},{space},;,,,:[olmpiurob refs #19535]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Added list type in ‘Data table (preview)’ in order to be used with Exhibit framework and also fix detection of columns that explicitly define column type in header using ‘:’ syntax (e.g. topics:list) [voineali refs #5316]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：在“数据表（预览）”中添加了列表类型，以便与Exhibit框架一起使用，并且还修复了对使用“：”语法在标题中明确定义列类型的列的检测（例如topic：list）[voineali refs＃ 5316]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Allow changing of column types within Edit Visualization > Data settings if data source is copy & pasted [voineali refs #5511]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：如果复制并粘贴了数据源，则允许在“编辑可视化”>“数据设置”中更改列类型[voineali refs＃5511]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Always use https protocol for www.google.com/jsapi [szabozo0]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。始终使用https协议www.google.com/jsapi [szabozo0]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Auto-include zcml within plone context in order to make this package work without having to add it within buildout zcml directive. [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。在plone上下文中自动包含zcml,以便使这个包能够工作,而不需要在buildout zcml指令中添加。[avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Don’t try to scale if image is already cached in browser, just return 304 with empty string [szabozo0 refs #97222]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：如果图像已经在浏览器中缓存，请不要尝试缩放，只需使用空字符串返回304 [szabozo0 refs＃97222]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fix “embed” and “export to png” buttons CSS [voineali]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：修复了“嵌入”和“导出为png”按钮CSS [voineali]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fix big header on “Edit Visualisations” [soniaand refs #17970]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：修复“编辑可视化效果”上的大标题[soniaand refs＃17970]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fix date and year column converters by skipping missing values instead of converting them to current year/date [voineali fixes #19235]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。修正日期和年份列转换器跳过缺失的值,而不是将其转换为当前年份/日期[voineali修正#19235]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fix pylint warnings [chiridra refs #71940]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。修正pylint警告[chiridra refs #71940]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed ‘Data settings’ table when there are many columns by adding a bottom scrollbar [voineali refs #5363]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：通过添加底部滚动条[voineali refs＃5363]修复了当有很多列时的“数据设置”表

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed ‘Enable View’ button CSS [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：修复了“启用视图”按钮CSS [avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed ‘unicode’ object has no attribute ‘get’ error on download.json [voineali fixes #5223]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：修复了“ unicode”对象在download.json上没有属性“ get”错误的问题[语音修复＃5223]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed auto-detection of numbers by lowering boolean priority [voineali refs #5316]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。通过降低布尔优先级,修正了自动检测数字的问题[voineali refs #5316]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed columnTypes in table header using :type syntax [voineali refs #5511]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。修正表头中使用:type语法的columnTypes[voineali refs #5511]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed daviz.json for uploaded files (.tsv, .csv) [voineali]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。修正了上传文件(.tsv、.csv)的daviz.json[voineali]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed download.(csv, tsv, html) methods for non-ASCII data [voineali refs #9610, #10168]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。修正了非ASCII数据的下载(csv,tsv,html)方法[voineali refs #9610,#10168]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed fix_column_labels upgrade step from version 6.2 [szabozo0]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。修正了fix_column_labels从6.2版升级的步骤[szabozo0]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed modal’s close button ui issues [tiberich #16928]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：修复了模式模式的关闭按钮ui问题[tiberich＃16928]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed profiles version [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。修正了配置文件版本[avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Fixed table layout [szabozo0]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。修正了表格布局[szabozo0]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Improved CSV dialect detection for files with a lot of missing values [voineali fixes #13851]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。改进了对有大量缺失值的文件的CSV方言检测[voineali修正#13851]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Increase the sample file data to 4096 due to csv sniffer unable to properly guess the csv dialect from a sample data of 2048 characters. [olimpiurob refs #19732]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。由于csv sniffer无法从2048个字符的样本数据中正确猜测csv方言,所以将样本文件数据增加到4096个。[limpiurob refs #19732]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Invalidate memcache on ObjectModifiedEvent for all IVisualizationEnabled objects [voineali #5074]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。在ObjectModifiedEvent上对所有IVisualizationEnabled对象无效的memcache [voineali #5074]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Made table’s columns headers editable within ‘Data settings’ panel in order to be able to edit them without having to add an Exhibit View [voineali refs #5363]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：在“数据设置”面板中使表格的列标题可编辑，以便无需添加展览视图即可对其进行编辑[voineali refs＃5363]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Move zope.formlib to extra_require [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。将zope.formlib移至extra_require[avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Optimize edit form by not calling editform 3 times only to tal condition [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。优化编辑表单,不要只调用editform 3次tal条件[avoinea]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Redirect to daviz-edit.html only when users add new visualizations [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。只有当用户添加新的可视化时才重定向到daviz-edit.html[avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Remove collective.js.jqueryui < 1.9 pin as it make this package unusable with Plone 4.3+ [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：删除Collector.js.jqueryui <1.9 pin，因为它使该软件包无法在Plone 4.3+中使用。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Removed hard dependency to Products.EEAContentTypes [voineali thanks to Nuno Zimas]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。删除了对Products.EEAContentTypes的硬依赖 [voineali thanks to Nuno Zimas]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Skip invalid or empty cells on conversion to daviz-json instead of falling back to 0. [voineali refs #5453]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正。在转换为daviz-json时跳过无效或空的单元格,而不是回落到0。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Updated old URLs pointing Trac [ghicaale refs #18003]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。更新了指向Trac的旧网址[ghicaale refs #18003]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Use converter fallback for table cells that doesn’t contain valid numbers, dates, etc in order to minimize errors [voineali #4934]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复：将转换器回退用于不包含有效数字，日期等的表格单元，以最大程度地减少错误[voineali＃4934]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Use non-@@ version of daviz-relateditems.json in order to easily cache and purge it using plone.app.caching [voineali #5074]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。使用非@@版本的daviz-relateditems.json,以便于使用plone.app.caching进行缓存和清除[voineali #5074]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: Wrap visualization info and download section within daviz-view.html with a div container in order to easily customize theme these sections [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。在daviz-view.html中用div容器封装可视化信息和下载部分,以便于自定义这些部分的主题[avoinea]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: accept % and # in id of columns as some charts need to have these characters [ichim-david refs #75896]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:接受列的id中的%和#,因为有些图表需要这些字符[ichim-david refs #75896]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: add namespace declaration for exhibit (makes Chameleon happy) [simahawk]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:为展览添加命名空间声明(让变色龙高兴)[simahawk]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: added missing glyphicons-halflings.png to correct path [zoltan_andras refs #84486]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:将缺失的glyphicons-halflings.png添加到正确路径[zoltan_andras refs #84486]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: condition chart-tabs for existance. This way we avoid a js error when no charts are added. [ichimdav refs #22901]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:以图表标签的存在为条件。这样可以避免在没有添加图表时出现js错误。[ichimdav refs #22901]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: fixed data format popup which was hidden by the data cells [ichimdav refs #27889]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:修正了被数据单元格隐藏的数据格式弹出窗口 [ichimdav refs #27889]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: fixed image viewing of preview images when they are referenced by the fullview [ichimdav refs #25835]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:修复了预览图片被全视图引用时的图片浏览问题[ichimdav refs #25835]。

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: fixed markup of HISTORY.txt file [ciobabog refs #5231]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:修复了HISTORY.txt文件的标记[ciobabog refs #5231]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: fixed unicode error when guessing columns type [ghicaale refs #26068]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:修复了猜测列类型时的unicode错误[ghicaale refs #26068]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: fixed visualisation tabs layout when many tabs spanning several rows are made. [demarant]
trans-unit.target: 错误修复:当许多标签页跨越几行时,固定可视化标签布局。[demarant]

trans-unit.source: Bug fix: use evnetlet to prevent hanging out connection [lucas refs #29063]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:使用evnetlet防止挂出连接[lucas refs #29063]。

trans-unit.source: Bug: DaViz: Color picker missing in GC add en language on google.api to fix daviz color picker [lucas refs #68198]
trans-unit.target: Bug:DaViz.Color picker missing in GC add en language on google.api 在GC中缺少颜色选择器,在google.api上添加en语言,以修复daviz颜色选择器[lucas refs #68198]。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: Fixed KSS issues in daviz controlpanel [szabozo0 refs #5616]
trans-unit.target: Bugfix:修正了daviz controlpanel中的KSS问题[szabozo0 refs #5616]。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: Fixed adding data from URL [szabozo0]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:修正了从URL[szabozo0]添加数据的问题。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: Fixed columns order [szabozo0 #5137]
trans-unit.target: 修正]:修正列顺序[szabozo0 #5137]

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: Fixed order of column labels when labels are numbers [szabozo0 refs #69360]
trans-unit.target: Bugfix:修正了当标签为数字时列标签的顺序[szabozo0 refs #69360]。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: Increased max_length for column names; Added migration step [szabozo0 refs #16684]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:增加了列名的最大长度,增加了迁移步骤[szabozo0 refs #16684]。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: Removed default data provenance for blobs [szabozo0 #25341]
trans-unit.target: Bugfix:删除了 blobs 的默认数据出处 [szabozo0 #25341]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Add more info on JSON UnicodeDecodeError [voineali refs #79895]
trans-unit.target: 更改。增加关于JSON UnicodeDecodeError的更多信息[voineali refs #79895]

trans-unit.source: Change: Added IVisualizationData and IVisualizationJson adapters API in order to dynamically provide data sources for visualization [voineali refs #5511]
trans-unit.target: 变化。增加了IVisualizationData和IVisualizationJson适配器API,以便为可视化动态提供数据源[voineali refs #5511]

trans-unit.source: Change: Added a common.js and common.css in order to reuse common components [voineali refs #9610]
trans-unit.target: 更改。增加了common.js和common.css,以便重用通用组件[voineali refs #9610]

trans-unit.source: Change: Added new resource for david view [iulianpetchesi refs #107671]
trans-unit.target: 更改。添加了新的David View资源[iulianpetchesi refs #107671]

trans-unit.source: Change: Added possibility to hide rename option on spreadsheet, Added warning on rename on the Data settings [szabozo0 refs #19149]
trans-unit.target: 更改。增加了隐藏电子表格重命名选项的可能性,增加了数据设置中重命名的警告[szabozo0 refs #19149]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Changed fetch url for jenkins builds install script to the install script from the main EEA CPB repository [olimpiurob refs #22402]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将获取jenkins builds安装脚本的url改为从EEA CPB主仓库获取安装脚本[olimpiurob refs #22402]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Cleanup memcache invalidation code as it’s already handled by eea.cache (7.0+) [voineali refs #20678]
trans-unit.target: 更改：清理内存缓存无效代码，因为它已经由eea.cache（7.0+）处理了[voineali refs＃20678]

trans-unit.source: Change: Cleanup old ‘sections’ code [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 更改：清除旧的“部分”代码[avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Change: Fixed tests for xml download [szabozo0]
trans-unit.target: 变化。修正了xml下载的测试 [szabozo0]

trans-unit.source: Change: Improved the labelling and display of downloadable data. [demarant]
trans-unit.target: 变化。改进了可下载数据的标记和显示。[demarant]

trans-unit.source: Change: Merged daviz-view.json and daviz-relateditems.json into one single json file called daviz.json [voineali refs #5449]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将daviz-view.json和daviz-relateditems.json合并为一个名为daviz.json的单一json文件[voineali refs #5449]

trans-unit.source: Change: Move column label settings from facet annotations directly to JSON [voineali refs $9610]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将列标签设置从面注释直接移至JSON[voineali refs $9610]

trans-unit.source: Change: Moved ‘Data settings’ tab to the end as it seems it confuses users about the next steps they have to take in order to create new visualizations [voineali refs #5363]
trans-unit.target: 更改：“数据设置”选项卡移到了最后，因为它似乎使用户对创建新的可视化效果所必须采取的下一步感到困惑[voineali refs＃5363]

trans-unit.source: Change: Moved data annotations to Daviz settings Control Panel [voineali refs #9558]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将数据注释移至Daviz设置控制面板[voineali refs #9558]

trans-unit.source: Change: Moved eea.exhibit specific code to eea.exhibit package and added API to easily insert HTML code within daviz-view.html head element. See IVisualizationViewHeader [voineali refs #14003]
trans-unit.target: 变化。将eea.exhibit的特定代码移至eea.exhibit包中,并添加了API,以便在daviz-view.html头元素中轻松插入HTML代码。参见 IVisualizationViewHeader [voineali refs #14003]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Moved tutorials to eea.daviz [szabozo0]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将教程移至eea.daviz [szabozo0]

trans-unit.source: Change: Refactoring “Data settings” as a daviz:view in order to easily disable it if necessary [voineali]
trans-unit.target: 更改：将“数据设置”重构为daviz：view，以便在必要时轻松禁用它[voineali]

trans-unit.source: Change: Refactoring ZCML slugs for daviz:view and daviz:edit. See eea.app.visualisation.views.data.configure.zcml for examples. [voineali]
trans-unit.target: 更改。重构daviz:view和daviz:edit的ZCML slugs。参见eea.app.visualisation.views.data.configure.zcml的例子。[voineali]

trans-unit.source: Change: Remove Sphinx generated documentation [petchesi-iulian refs #88212]
trans-unit.target: 更改。删除Sphinx生成的文件[petchesi-iulian refs #88212]

trans-unit.source: Change: Removed eea.jquery.js from jsregistry as it’s no more required in Plone 4.3
trans-unit.target: 更改：从jsregistry中删除了eea.jquery.js，因为在Plone 4.3中不再需要

trans-unit.source: Change: Replace eeacms/zptlint with eeacms/plone-test:4 zptlint [avoinea refs #90415]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将eeacms/zptlint改为eeacms/plone-test:4 zptlint [avoinea refs #90415]

trans-unit.source: Change: Replace misused logger.exception with logger.warn [voineali refs #75388]
trans-unit.target: 改动:将错误使用的logger.exception替换为logger.war。将误用的logger.exception改为logger.war[voineali refs #75388]

trans-unit.source: Change: Switched to curl in the jenkins builds install script [olimpiurob refs #22402]
trans-unit.target: 更改。在 jenkins builds 安装脚本中改用 curl [olimpiurob refs #22402]。

trans-unit.source: Change: Use SlickGrid jQuery plug-in to manipulate data table within Edit Visualization > Data settings Tab [avoinea refs #5599, #5625]
trans-unit.target: 更改：使用SlickGrid jQuery插件在“编辑可视化”>“数据设置”选项卡中操作数据表[avoinea refs＃5599，＃5625]
更改：将jQuery选项卡用于Plone ControlPanel中的“ Daviz可视化设置” [voineali]

trans-unit.source: Change: Use null for missing values in boolean fields when downloading csv,tsv and json [olimpiurob refs #19206]
trans-unit.target: 更改。下载csv,tsv和json时,对布尔字段中的缺失值使用null [OLIMPIURB refs #19206]

trans-unit.source: Change: WebDav lock object when a visualization is edited (edit visualization) [voineali refs #19172]
trans-unit.target: 更改。当编辑可视化内容时,WebDav锁定对象(编辑可视化内容)[voineali refs #19172]

trans-unit.source: Change: check if DavizEdit.Events exists before overriding it withing js files in case DavizEdit isn’t found and is constructed [ichimdav refs #27220]
trans-unit.target: 更改：在未找到DavizEdit并构造DavizEdit的情况下，请使用js文件覆盖DavizEdit.Events，然后检查是否存在[ichimdav refs＃27220]

trans-unit.source: Change: daviz view tabs design tweaks [ichim-david refs #119540]
trans-unit.target: 更改:daviz视图标签的设计调整 [ichim-david refs #119540]。

trans-unit.source: Change: daviz-edit.css uses content-box box-sizing property since Google charts styles doesn’t cope with border-box. This allows us to use newer versions of Bootstrap which contains box-sizing [ichimdav refs #25986]
trans-unit.target: 更改：daviz-edit.css使用content-box box-sizing属性，因为Google图表样式无法应对border-box。这使我们可以使用包含Box-size的较新版本的Bootstrap [ichimdav参考＃25986]

trans-unit.source: Change: fixed PyLint warnings and errors [eduard-fironda refs #84949]
trans-unit.target: 更改:修正了PyLint的警告和错误[eduard-fironda refs #84949]。

trans-unit.source: Change: fixed PyLint warnings and errors [valipod refs #84949]
trans-unit.target: 更改:修正PyLint警告和错误[valipod refs #84949]。

trans-unit.source: Change: load customized collective.js.jqueryui on eea context for view pages [ichim-david refs #91577]
trans-unit.target: 修改:在eea上下文中加载自定义的collective.js.jqueryui,用于查看页面[ichim-david refs #91577]。

trans-unit.source: Change: updated URLs pointing to eea.europa.eu with https:// [alecghica refs #95849]
trans-unit.target: 更改：使用https：// [alecghica refs＃95849]更新了指向eea.europa.eu的URL。

trans-unit.source: Change: updated package information [eduard-fironda]
trans-unit.target: 变动:更新了软件包信息[eduard-fironda]

trans-unit.source: Change: use prop instead of attr when setting value on input tags for jquery 1.9+ compatibility [ichim-david refs #105112]
trans-unit.target: 修改:为jquery 1.9+兼容性设置输入标签值时,使用prop代替attr [ichim-david refs #105112]。

trans-unit.source: Change: year and date types now have an lower and upper bounds of 1500-2500. This loosens the previous restriction of 1900-2200 for valid year values [ichimdav refs #25502]
trans-unit.target: 变化:年份和日期类型现在有一个1500-2500的下限和上限。这放宽了以前对有效年份值1900-2200的限制[ichimdav refs #25502]。

trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.target: 仅展览：http : //www.eea.europa.eu/data-and-maps/data/national-emissions-reported-to-the-unfccc-and-to-the-eu-greenhouse-gas-monitoring-mechanism -3 /国家-总和-不包括lulucf / ghg_v10_extract.csv

trans-unit.source: Feature: Add InternalData utility that recognize and internal URL and bypass security (if needed) in order to get visualization data [voineali refs #19075]
trans-unit.target: 功能。增加InternalData实用程序,识别内部URL并绕过安全性(如果需要)以获得可视化数据[voineali refs #19075]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added “year” column type in order to format dates columns as years [voineali refs #9583]
trans-unit.target: 功能：添加了“年份”列类型，以便将日期列格式化为年份[voineali refs＃9583]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added API for Visualization data source provenance [voineali refs #5490]
trans-unit.target: 功能:增加了可视化数据源出处的API [voineali refs #5490]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added an easy way to plugin CSS/JS resources by simply providing some utilities (see eea.app.visualization.browser.res.interfaces.py) [voineali refs #5420]
trans-unit.target: 功能。增加了一个简单的方法来插入CSS/JS资源,只需提供一些实用工具(见eea.app.visualization.browser.res.interface.py)[voineali refs #5420]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added an easy way to register Google Maps key when using without Plone by adding ‘google_key’ property on context (parents) or by providing a utility (see eea.app.visualization.zopera.utils.py) [voineali refs #5420, #5421]
trans-unit.target: 功能：通过在上下文（父母）上添加'google_key'属性或提供实用程序（请参见eea.app.visualization.zopera.utils.py），添加了一种在不使用Plone的情况下注册Google Maps密钥的简便方法[voineali refs＃5420 ，＃5421]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added confirm dialog in order to prevent accidentally disable of visualizations [voineali refs #9572]
trans-unit.target: 功能。增加了确认对话框,以防止意外地禁用可视化[voineali refs #9572]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added i18n translations [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 特点。新增i18n翻译[avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added italian translations [simahawk]
trans-unit.target: 特点。增加了意大利语翻译 [西玛鹰]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added screencasts tutorial page [szabozo0 refs #18400]
trans-unit.target: 特点。新增屏幕直播教程页面[szabozo0 refs #18400]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added test for missing values in json boolean fields and downloading as tsv [olimpiurob refs #19206]
trans-unit.target: 功能。增加了对json布尔值字段中缺失值的测试,并下载为tsv [OLIMpiurob refs #19206]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added unique URLs for tabs in view mode in order to easily bookmark and share them. Also support browser history (back and forward buttons) [voineali refs #4851]
trans-unit.target: 特点。在视图模式下为标签页添加了唯一的URL,以便于收藏和分享。同时支持浏览器历史记录(后退和前进按钮)[voineali refs #4851]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: Added utilities to get and convert external URL to data ready for visualization [voineali refs #9576]
trans-unit.target: 特点:增加了获取和转换外部URL到数据的实用工具,为可视化做好准备。增加了获取和转换外部URL到数据的实用程序,为可视化做好准备[voineali refs #9576]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: Allow query in the url after the hash with the chart id [szabozo0 refs #17066]
trans-unit.target: 特点:允许在图表id的哈希后的url中查询。允许在图表id的hash后的url中查询[szabozo0 refs #17066]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Allow the user to confirm and adjust auto-detected column types [voineali refs #5024]
trans-unit.target: 功能。允许用户确认和调整自动检测的列类型[voineali refs #5024]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Also support content-type=’text/html’ as some external JSON/TSV external URLs doesn’t correctly set response headers [voineali refs #14360]
trans-unit.target: 功能：还支持content-type ='text / html'，因为某些外部JSON / TSV外部URL不能正确设置响应头[voineali refs＃14360]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Changed data provenance to allow multiple data provenances [szabozo0 #9561]
trans-unit.target: 功能。更改数据出处,允许多个数据出处 [szabozo0 #9561]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Display image when javascript is disabled [szabozo0 refs #9562]
trans-unit.target: 功能。当javascript被禁用时显示图像[szabozo0 refs #9562]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Handling specific annotations for data values [voineali refs #9558]
trans-unit.target: 功能。处理数据值的特定注释[voineali refs #9558]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Improved UX of daviz regarding errors [szabozo0 #5372]
trans-unit.target: 功能。改进了daviz关于错误的用户体验 [szabozo0 #5372]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Made Visualization data downloadable (HTML, CSV, TSV, JSON, XML, XML with Schema) [voineali #5038]
trans-unit.target: 特点。可下载可视化数据(HTML、CSV、TSV、JSON、XML、XML with Schema)[voineali #5038]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Made plone collection as daviz data source [avoinea refs #5604]
trans-unit.target: 特点:将plone集合作为daviz数据源。将plone收集作为daviz数据源[avoinea refs #5604]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Made this package Plone independent (Zope2 minimal requirements) [voineali refs #5420]
trans-unit.target: 特点:将此包独立于Plone(Zope2最低要求)。使该包独立于Plone(Zope2最低要求)[voineali refs #5420]

trans-unit.source: Feature: On saving a chart, copy the generic chart image in the visualization [szabozo0 refs #10019]
trans-unit.target: 特点。保存图表时,在可视化中复制通用图表图像[szabozo0 refs #10019]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Package localization enhanced [lepri]
trans-unit.target: 特点。包装本地化增强型[lepri]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Possibility to disable daviz views per Content-Type. See Site Setup > Daviz Visualization > Enable / Disable [voineali]
trans-unit.target: 功能：可以按每种Content-Type禁用daviz视图。请参阅网站设置> Daviz可视化>启用/禁用[voineali]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Removed lovely.memcached dependency [voineali refs #14343]
trans-unit.target: 特性。删除了lovely.memcached的依赖关系[voineali refs #14343]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Removed p4a.z2utils dependency [voineali fixes #5419]
trans-unit.target: 特点:删除了p4a.z2utils的依赖性。删除了对p4a.z2utils的依赖[voineali修正#5419]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Support all Simile Exhibit facets [voineali refs #10007]
trans-unit.target: 特点:支持所有的Simile展面。支持所有的Simile Exhibit面[voineali refs #10007]

trans-unit.source: Feature: Support non-ASCII datasets (column headers and body) [voineali refs #9610, #10168]
trans-unit.target: 特性。支持非ASCII数据集(列头和正文)[voineali refs #9610,#10168]

trans-unit.target: 特点:升级到Simile Exhibit 3.0 升级到Simile Exhibit 3.0 [voineali refs #13807]

trans-unit.target: 功能。在数据设置和展览面配置中使用FontAwesome图标[batradav refs #17861]。

trans-unit.source: Feature: added belowcontenttitle.documentbyline viewlet to be visible under “Edit Visualizations” tab [ghicaale refs #21457]
trans-unit.target: 功能：在“编辑可视化”选项卡下可见以下contenttitle.documentbyline视图[ghicaale refs＃21457]

trans-unit.target: 特点:为贡献者添加信息[ciobabog refs #13892]

trans-unit.target: 功能:在页面模板格式中添加Sphinx生成的文档[batradav refs #9502]。

trans-unit.target: 功能：daviz和gis应用程序的html正文字段-添加了新字段“ body”-修改了视图模板[chiridra refs＃70146]

trans-unit.source: Tell the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe to install a ZCML slug
trans-unit.target: 告诉 plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe 安装一个 ZCML slug。
EEA App Visualization(原始代码)是自由软件;您可以根据自由软件基金会发布的GNU通用公共许可证的条款对其进行再发布和/或修改;该许可证的第2版或(由您选择)任何更新的版本。

trans-unit.source: The Initial Owner of the Original Code is European Environment Agency (EEA). All Rights Reserved.
trans-unit.target: 原始代码的最初所有者是欧洲环境署(EEA)。保留所有权利。

trans-unit.source: This package as standalone is just an API, you have to either install eea.daviz bundle, either install one of the available visualization libraries (eea.exhibit, eea.googlecharts, etc) in order to have a working Visualization Tool for your files.
trans-unit.target: 此软件包作为独立的软件包只是一个API，您必须安装 eea.daviz捆绑包，或者安装可用的可视化库之一（eea.exhibit，eea.googlecharts等），以便为您的文件提供有效的可视化工具。

trans-unit.source: Update your buildout.cfg file:
trans-unit.target: 更新你的 buildout.cfg 文件。

trans-unit.source: Upgrade step: Within “Plone > Site setup > Add-ons” click on upgrade button available for eea.app.visualization
trans-unit.target: 升级步骤：在“克隆>网站设置>附件”中，单击可用于eea.app.visualization的升级按钮

trans-unit.source: Upgrade step: Within “Plone > Site setup > Add-ons” click on upgrade button available for eea.app.visualization [voineali refs #5419]

trans-unit.source: Visualization API
trans-unit.target: 可视化API

trans-unit.source: You can skip the ZCML slug if you are going to explicitly include the package from another package’s configure.zcml file.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从另一个软件包的configure.zcml文件中明确包含该软件包，则可以跳过ZCML插件。
